Headline: #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Roscoe/Aldine
ShortDescription: Southbound 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison, Broadway, Sheridan and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison, Broadway, Sheridan and Belmont due to street blockage near Roscoe/Aldine

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

#36 Broadway

#81 Lawrence

#92 Foster

#151 Sheridan

#146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
